title: Wait What
body:
I uh. I haven't said a bad thing at all on my smurf lol. I've only been playing Bot matches, and I've been super positive. I've been saying a lot of "good job"s and "great work"s and such, and I even said some of the people were so kind that we needed more like that. 

I literally haven't said a single bad  thing... Except...

In all chat, to the enemy bots. I've said "Get fucked" or "Fucking rekt" or "You suck"... In all chat... To the bots...

I mean I'm not mad or anything, I just think it's funny. I mean it's my smurf and honestly I have no reason to be upset about anything in regards to it because I don't take anything serious but uh.

Huh...
